content: अयोनि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Without origin or source, eternal; जगद्योनिरयोनिस्त्वं <ls>Ku. 2. 9.</ls> {@--2@} Not born from the womb; born in a manner not approved by law or religion. --निः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not the womb; <ls>Y. 2. 293</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 174.</ls> {@--2@} Not a particular verse of the Sāmaveda. --निः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Brahmā and Śiva. {@--2@} A pestle.
